item.title: Tactical overview of your varnish instances
item.description: varnish-top is a handy util for keeping track of our varnish installation (via Denis). From the google-code project page page: Simply, it is a tool that lets you monitor a few key stats from one or more varnish boxes in real-time, from the command line, in a top-like screen. It's not the most sophisticated tool, but is handy for seeing a real-time view into how your box(es) are doing without needing to set up graphing, open up a browser, etc.
